name: Big Buck Hunter 2006: Call of the Wild
overview:
Big Buck Hunter 2006: Call of the Wild is an entry in the Big Buck Hunter series and the last made by Incredible Technologies.

This release which was both available as a standalone cabinet and as an upgrade to Big Buck Hunter II: Sportsman's Paradise adds a new U.S. region, the Northeast making the total number of regions six. Five U.S. regions plus Canada, where each region has four hunting sites. Each site in turn has five stands and a bonus round where you shoot at multiple different animals or artificial targets. Antelope is a new hunt animal and there are new bonus modes. Also new is the ability to paying for one or more hunting trips at the beginning.

As before in the series, apart from the original Big Buck Hunter, you can shoot up to three bucks or bulls per stand. Hitting a doe or a cow counts as a miss.
